name: devskim-vscode-plugin
description: This is the VS Code plugin project for DevSkim.  It is implemented in two parts - a Client that handles the integration and interaction with VS Code, and an out of proc server that handles the analysis.  This allows for more process intensive analysis without interfering in the responsiveness of the IDE.
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.clean: yarn run clean:local && yarn run clean:server && yarn run clean:client
scripts.clean:server: cd server && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:client: cd client && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm  install && cd ..
scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run compile && yarn run test
scripts.check:bail: yarn run lint:bail && yarn run compile && yarn run test
